alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:16PM EST until March 01 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LOW PRESSURE TO BRING ACCUMULATING SNOW TO THE REGION THROUGH THIS EVENING... .An area of low pressure will exit the region tonight. Snow will taper off west to east before ending overnight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches for a storm total of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Sullivan, Northern Grafton, Southern Grafton, Coastal Rockingham, and Eastern Hillsborough Counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan
